title: Create website for Ryuuk Gaming console gaming channel

requirements.text: Create a homepage that introduces Ryuuk Gaming as a console gaming channel with a hero section, channel description, and call-to-action to explore content
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays Ryuuk Gaming branding prominently
Hero section includes channel tagline and visual appeal
Clear navigation to other sections of the site

requirements.text: Build a games showcase section displaying featured console games with cover images, titles, and brief descriptions
acceptanceCriteria: Games are displayed in a responsive grid layout
Each game shows cover art, title, and description
Games can be added, updated, and removed through the backend

requirements.text: Create a videos/content section where gaming videos or streams can be featured with thumbnails, titles, and links
acceptanceCriteria: Content items display with thumbnail images
Each item includes title, description, and external link
Content can be managed through backend storage

requirements.text: Implement an about section explaining the Ryuuk Gaming channel's focus on console gaming, mission, and community
acceptanceCriteria: About section describes the channel's focus and purpose
Section is easily accessible from main navigation
Content is clearly formatted and readable

requirements.text: Add a contact or community section with social media links and ways to connect with the gaming channel
acceptanceCriteria: Social media links are prominently displayed
Contact information or connection methods are clear
Links open correctly in new tabs

requirements.text: Design the website with a gaming-themed aesthetic featuring bold, energetic colors (avoiding blue and purple), dynamic typography, and dark mode styling that suits console gaming content
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme is bold and gaming-appropriate
Dark theme enhances gaming content visibility
Design is cohesive across all pages

required: Gaming hero banner with console controllers and dynamic gaming elements (hero-banner.dim_1920x600.png)
Ryuuk Gaming logo with bold gaming aesthetic (logo.dim_400x400.png)
Console gaming themed background pattern for sections (gaming-pattern.dim_1200x800.png)
